executable.title: TransferRegionAndTypeIndicesToFromPoints
executable.description: This program converts region and type indices files to region and type \ points files and vice-versa.
executable.contributor: Applied Chest Imaging Laboratory, Brigham and Women's Hospital
executable.acknowledgements: This work is funded by the National Heart, Lung, And Blood Institute of the National \ Institutes of Health under Award Number R01HL116931. The content is solely the responsibility of the authors \ and does not necessarily represent the official views of the National Institutes of Health.

file.name: inputPointsFile
file.label: Input region and type points file
file.description: Input region and type points file name (csv).

file.name: inputIndicesFile
file.label: Input region and type indices file
file.description: Input region and type indices file name (csv).

file.name: outputPointsFile
file.label: Output region and type points file
file.description: Output region and type points file name (csv).

file.name: outputIndicesFile
file.label: Output region and type indices file
file.description: Output region and type indices file name (csv).

image.name: ctFile
image.label: Reference CT file
image.description: Input reference CT file needed for origin and spacing information
